message: Fair split, let's start with this

This is my final offer.  Let's come to an agreement before we both lose out.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still willing to give you a chance to change your mind

This is it, Alice.  I'm taking a huge loss, but at least I'll get something.  You've been stubborn, but it looks like we both lose if we don't agree.
